solution.title: How we do it
solution.subtitle: At Subliminal AI, our goal is to make a substantial positive impact on the bottom line of your business as soon as possible. To make sure this happens, we follow a structured process for all our AI projects.

card_1.title: Data strategy and Understanding
card_1.description: For new customers, it's important for us to get a holistic understanding of the data sources in your company, identify what's useful now and what isn't and provide clarity on cleaning up currently unusable data so it can be utilized in future analysis.
card_1.output: Output: Recommendations for multiple future projects that will have the highest impact.

card_2.title: Identify the highest value project and build a proof of concept
card_2.description: Every AI problem is difficult to get right the first time. We start by developing a good baseline model and solution that can be improved on over time. This ensures that the business idea is actually possible
card_2.output: Output: A working proof of concept solution that can be evaluated and tested easily.

card_3.title: Move the proof of concept into production
card_3.description: So we've ensured our idea will work and has potential, now is the time to collect more data and improve the models we've developed in the proof of concept so you know you can trust the model to drive the most
card_3.output: Output: A polished, high performing model, integrated into your existing business application or data platform.

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: At Subliminal AI, we have experience delivering many forms of intelligent systems. Here's what we can do for your company.

card_1.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
card_1.description: We specialize in creating structured knowledge from unstructured text.

card_2.title: Computer Vision
card_2.description: Does your company have a lot of images or videos? Turn that raw media into structured

card_3.title: Data Analysis & Predictive Analytics
card_3.description: Whatever form your data is in, we can work with you to clean, augment, and analyze it to provide you with intelligent insights and predictive power.

card_4.title: End-to-end Software Development
card_4.description: Machine Learning is only useful if you can actually integrate it into your product. We understand the importance of software development practices and will work to integrate any models we create directly into your business applications.

bio.title: ABOUT THE AUTHOR
bio.description: Mark Brandao is an Inbound Marketer for Iconosquare, based in the Limoges office.She loves all things social and revels in keeping on top of the social media marketing game by writing for the blog.She’s also a bit obsessed with sushi and Netflix.
